bibl.title: Coptic Antiquities. I. Stone Sculpture, Bronze Objects; Ceramic Coffin Lids and Vessels; Terracotta Statuettes, Bone, Wood, and Glass Artefacts. (Monumenta Antiquitatis extra fines Hungariae reperta. 2.)
bibl.note: 300 objects kept in the Budapest Museum of Fine Arts, representing all important aspects of daily life in 5th to 12th century A.D. Egypt.

TÖRÖK László, Coptic Antiquities. I. Stone Sculpture, Bronze Objects; Ceramic Coffin Lids and Vessels; Terracotta Statuettes, Bone, Wood, and Glass Artefacts. (Monumenta Antiquitatis extra fines Hungariae reperta. 2.)
Roma, "L'Erma" di Bretschneider, 1993, 4°, 74 pp. et 106 pll. ISBN 88-7062-805-1. L. 180.000.
